thread.section_title: CarTrawler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarTrawler | www.cartrawler.com
thread.title: Ronnie Walker

author: Ronnie Walker
title: Ronnie Walker
text:
Booked for pickup and 1 airport and drop off at another. Pickup was in Dublin and you have to locate shuttle bus to get to pickup car. Not the easiest to find but took around 20 mins all in to get there. No waiting and see right away. Staff very friendly and booking was completed quickly and allowed us to be on out way with minimum disruption.
Returning car again - not easy to locate where the desk was (Cork Airport and AVIS desk is in main terminal) while car drop off is a 10/15 min walk away. No one present to check the car at drop off so took photos to prove no damage myself.
Over all quick and easy process and would use Cartrawler / Avis again.
